EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-04-03-AWS-Summit-SF-VIP-Dinner.Marketing Invite 1.EMAIL 1
EmailTemplate.subject: You're invited: AWS Summit VIP Dinner (Apr 3, 2018)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
On behalf of Charles Crouchman, CTO at Turbonomic, we are pleased to invite you to an exclusive networking dinner prior to AWS Summit San Francisco at The Slanted Door. <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]> Together with your technology peers, we'll enjoy a private dining experience with amazing views of The Bay while we enjoy the modern Vietnamese cuisine by Executive Chef Charles Phan. Whether you are a current customer or considering to join the Turbonomic family, we hope that you will join us as we discuss the latest challenges in hybrid cloud estates and learn what to expect in the next release of the Turbonomic platform. AWS Summit VIP Dinner
Where: The Slanted Door <[[http://www.slanteddoor.com/]]> Tuesday, April 3, 2018, 6:30 PM PT <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]> <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]>
As seats are limited we do ask that you please RSVP here <[[https://www.eventbrite.com/e/aws-summit-vip-dinner-registration-44365454268]]>.
We hope to see you there,
Your friends at Turbonomic
